name: Skyfall: The Collector's Edition
description:
Made for GGJ2021 - Lost and Found

Search your inventory for the right items and weapons to overcome the enemies and obstacles.

Programming: Ido Adler
Art: Rotem Ezra, Einat Keshet
Music: Alon Kaplan
SFX: Shaked Lotan
Game Design: Chen "Grace" Ashkenazi
